name: Buried Ziggurat
description: A stepped temple that once reached toward the heavens now lies partially buried and forgotten. The religious significance and potential magical properties attract clerics and scholars, while the buried nature creates unique exploration challenges and opportunities for discovery.
atmosphere: Footsteps echo through chambers that once reached toward heavens. Air carries religious significance, old magic, and forgotten worship dust scent. Stepped temple rises partially from earth like giant emerging from ancient soil. Skin tingles with sense of buried chambers and exploration challenges. Taste of religious significance and potential magical properties fills mouth. Weight of forgotten worship and buried nature presses down on you.
